## Suggester.createCommand() method

Create the suggested actions which are made available to the `onExit` and on`onChange` handlers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createCommand?(params: CreateSuggestCommandParams): GCommand;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | <code>CreateSuggestCommandParams</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`GCommand`

## Remarks

Suggested actions are useful for developing plugins and extensions which provide useful defaults for managing the suggestion lifecycle.
